snippet.title: BEAST CRIMES - TRAILER
snippet.description:
Embark on a thrilling journey through the annals of time in this beastly crime investigation drama that transcends the boundaries of eras.

Immerse yourself in the mysteries of three distinct time periods. The distant past of Ancient Egypt, the bustling present of the 21st century, and the futuristic landscape of Neo Tokyo!

‘The past, present, and future await your investigation!’

https://www.beastcrimes.com/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1571090/Beast_Crimes/

#indiegame #furries #games #beastcrimes
